00099 template <typename T>
00100 T stf::linFit(const std::vector<T>& x,
00101         const std::vector<T>& y,
00102         T& m,
00103         T& c)
00104 {
00105     double sum_x=0.0;
00106     double sum_y=0.0;
00107     double sum_xx=0.0;
00108     double sum_xy=0.0;
00109     for (unsigned n=0;n<x.size();++n) {
00110         sum_x+=x[n];
00111         sum_y+=y[n];
00112         sum_xx+=x[n]*x[n];
00113         sum_xy+=x[n]*y[n];
00114     }
00115     m=(T)(((T)x.size()*sum_xy-sum_x*sum_y)/((T)x.size()*sum_xx-sum_x*sum_x));
00116     c=(T)((sum_y-m*sum_x)/(T)x.size());
00117     T error = 0.0;
00118     for (unsigned n=0;n<x.size();++n) {
00119         error += (y[n]-(m*x[n]+c)) * (y[n]-(m*x[n]+c));
00120     }
00121     return error;
00122 
00125 }
